data: CARD AMB Sarcoid Clinic
Medications
Phase 1: Initiation of Treatment
predniSONE
See Instructions, 40 mg, PO, qdaily x 4weeks,then decrease by 5 mg/day q2 weeks until taking 20mg PO daily, and continue this for 4 months, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 224 doses or times
alendronate 70 mg oral tablet
70 mg, PO, qweek, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 13 tab, refill(s): 2
calcium carbonate(dosed as elemental calcium)
1000 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 90 tab, refill(s): 2
Vitamin D3
800 unit 1 tab, PO,qdaily, drug form:tab, dispense qty: 90 tab, refill(s): 2
sulfamethoxazole-trimethoprim SS
1 tab, PO, qdaily, sulfamethoxazole 400 mg - trimethoprim 80 mg (1tablet), order duration: 270 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 90 tab, refill(s): 2
pantoprazole 40 mg oral delayed release tablet
40 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 90, refill(s): 2
Phase 2: Weaning
predniSONE

See Instructions,  17.5 mg, PO qdaily x2weeks, then decrease by 2.5 mg/day q2 weeks until taking 10mg/day x 2 weeks. Then decrease by 1 mg/day q1 week until stop, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 112 doses or times
